defaults to . defaults to . defaults to . defaults to true defaults to false

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SessionOptions.IdleTimeout
member.summary: The IdleTimeout indicates how long the session can be idle before its contents are abandoned. Each session access resets the timeout. Note this only applies to the content of the session, not the cookie.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.SessionOptions.IOTimeout
member.summary: The maximim amount of time allowed to load a session from the store or to commit it back to the store. Note this may only apply to asynchronous operations. This timeout can be disabled using .

summary.para: This property is obsolete and will be removed in a future version. The recommended alternative is on .
Determines the cookie name used to persist the session ID.
This property is obsolete and will be removed in a future version. The recommended alternative is on .
Determines the domain used to create the cookie. Is not provided by default.
This property is obsolete and will be removed in a future version. The recommended alternative is on .
Determines the path used to create the cookie. Defaults to .
This property is obsolete and will be removed in a future version. The recommended alternative is on .

Determines if the browser should allow the cookie to be accessed by client-side JavaScript. The default is true, which means the cookie will only be passed to HTTP requests and is not made available to script on the page.
This property is obsolete and will be removed in a future version. The recommended alternative is on .
Determines if the cookie should only be transmitted on HTTPS requests.
